channel.title: Rs3server
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][B] OLDRS3
[CENTER][SIZE=4][B]RS3SERVER IS BACK AGAIN
RS3SERVER WAS ONE OF THE FIRST FEW RSPS WHICH USED TO HAVE AROUND 500 PLAYERS ONLINE AVERAGE
DUE TO VARIOUS ISSUES, IT WAS DOWN FOR A FEW MONTHS
WITH THE COMMITMENT OF OLD OWNERS AND CODERS, IT IS REVIVED ONCE AGAIN
JOIN THIS ADVENTURE WHERE YOU WILL BE NEVER LEFT BEHIND [/B][/SIZE] [B][SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Homepage -[/B] [url=http://oldrs3.com/]http://oldrs3.com/[/url]
[B]Forum -[/B] [url=http://oldrs3.com/forum/]Rs3server[/url]
[B]Play now -[/B] [url=http://oldrs3.com/download/Client.jar]http://oldrs3.com/download/Client.jar[/url] [SIZE=6] SPECIAL FEATURES:[/SIZE]
[B]MINIGAMES - 100% working, authentic Dungeoneering 3 modes - Normal, Ironman, Hardcore Ironman Grand Exchange All working bosses - Including oldschool bosses such as Kraken, Zulrah and Scorpia All working minigames 100+ Achievements Working Quests Prestige system Highscores 100% working skills Very smooth PKing FREE DONOR RANK EVENT FOR LIMITED TIME ONLY![/B]
[B] RS3SERVER A FEW YEARS BACK:[/B]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=342RMtiQBh8]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=342RMtiQBh8[/url]
[B][SIZE=4]Rs3Server Now[/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://s14.postimg.org/7k9aj987l/dungdung.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimg.org/8wqzl55n5/rsadv1.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimg.org/kcxej6jtd/rsadv2.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimg.org/5n7z0xs5t/rsadv3.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimg.org/fbq0htccx/rsadv5.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]MADE WITH DEDICATION][/SIZE] [SIZE=5] INNOVATION AT ITS BEST[/SIZE] [SIZE=6] JOIN OLDRS3 NOW![/SIZE][/CENTER]
Updated!
- Added old school bosses such as Kraken, Scorpia and Zulrah - 0 DUPE! Come and test if you don't believe. - Improved Ironman modes! - using Original Domain
Rs3server.com Join today
